quest.name: The Color of Angry Qiqirn
journal: Meffrid understands that you must act quickly to save Wercrata.
objectives: Search for Wercrata near the Ziggurat.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We're wasting time! Let's go, go, go!

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: (You shouldn't get her hopes up like that. Everyone knows the ratmen eat their prisoners.)

dialogue.name: SHARPEYEDWOMEN
dialogue.text: If this sodding leg of mine was any good, I'd...

dialogue.name: BEWILDEREDWOMEN
dialogue.text: You've got to hurry! The gods only know what they could be doing to him!

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: So Wercrata's being held somewhere at the Ziggurat to the south, which has been taken over by a host of Qiqirn bandits. That about covers it, then.

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: Be prepared for a fight. They may not be the most challenging foes, but there's sure to be a lot of them.

dialogue.name: WERCRATA
dialogue.text: (-???-)Please, let me go! I'm begging you! I don't want to die!

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: Hear that? I think it came from the top of the Ziggurat!

dialogue.name: QIQIRNMEATGNASHER
dialogue.text: Who dares come to loot our man-flesh! Ours to eat! Ours to eat!

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: We knew it'd come to this. Kill them quick, before they alert the others!

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You sense a slavering presence!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Looters!?

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text:
Man-flesh is ours!
Man-flesh is ours!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> I thought you said they'd be no challenge!

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> I also said there'd be a bloody host of them!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Go and loot your own loots!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text:
Eat your flesh too
for this trespass!

dialogue.name: WERCRATA
dialogue.text: By Rhalgr, what did I ever do to deserve this? I've gone to bed hungry for months. I'm skin and bones! I'd hardly make a snack, much less a meal...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Oh, you found him!

dialogue.name: WERCRATA
dialogue.text: W-Wait...are you here to rescue me?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Your sister sent us. It's going to be all right.

dialogue.name: WERCRATA
dialogue.text: My sister? Oh, Rhalgr be praised, she's safe! And you...you lot fought your way in here just for me? To think there are still good, brave folk in this world...

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: We should go before the Qiqirn return in force. Do you still have the tributum?

dialogue.name: WERCRATA
dialogue.text: Oh gods, the tributum! The imperials will be wondering where I am! I have to go!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: What, right now? In your condition?

dialogue.name: WERCRATA
dialogue.text: You don't understand─we were given a warning last month for being short! If I don't make it in time, there's no telling what will happen to me and my sister!

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: Aan like him are barely considered people under imperial rule. They're to work hard and pay their taxes, and if they don't, there'll be seven hells to pay. Beatings, imprisonment, enslavement─and as for your womenfolk, well...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I'm glad we saved him, but seeing him run off like that... I've got a bad feeling about this.
